CLIFFORD   |   Times Available at Clear Sky, at 418 Cleveland St., in downtown Clearwater, is Cannoli Blintzes, crepes stuffed with sweet ricotta creme topped with chocolate chips and whipped cream. By Laura Reiley Former Times Staffer Published Laura Reiley Former Times Staffer MORE FOR YOU New Italian restaurant coming to Carrollwood, from Cooper’s Hawk group • Food Hungry Harry’s celebrates 40 years of Land O’ Lakes barbecue • Food Advertisement Lucky Tigre has moved to a new restaurant space in Old West Tampa • Food Tampa’s Olive Tree restaurant is already good. Clear Sky offers breakfast, lunch, dinner and late-night nibbles seven days a week. Browse Our Menu Specials Buy Gift Cards About Us Accessibility Guidelines Gasoline Alley ONLINE Takeout & Delivery Beer Dinner Tickets Web Content Accessibility Guidelines At Clear Sky Restaurants we are committed to ensuring that individuals with disabilities enjoy full access to our websites. In recognition of this commitment, Clear Sky Restaurants is in the process of making modifications to increase the accessibility and usability of this website, using the relevant portions of the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0 (WCAG 2.0) as our standard. Please be aware that our efforts are ongoing. If, at any time, you have difficulty using this website, or with a particular web page or function on this site, please contact us by phone 727-449-2729 or email Accessibility@ClearSkyDraughtHaus.com and we will make all reasonable efforts to assist you. Contact Us - Clear Sky - The Power of Play Facebook X Instagram About us Our Policies News Institute for Play and Attachment Member Login Emotionally Healthy Schools Member Login Find an Attachment Play Practitioner Contact Us Professional Development for Therapists Our Courses for Professionals Institute for Play and Attachment Practitioner resources Therapy Services for Schools Play and Creative Arts Therapy Services for Schools Emotionally Healthy Schools Our Courses for Schools Support for Families Free Resources for Parents and Carers Our Groups for Parents and Carers Find an Attachment Play Practitioner Shop Support our work Select Page Contact Us Thanks for your interest in Clear Sky. If you would like to get in touch simply fill out the contact us form and we will endeavour to reply as soon as possible. Contact Name * Email * Subject * Message * Captcha Submit If you are human, leave this field blank. Your Privacy At Clear Sky trust is the key to everything we do. As our latest privacy policy (in accordance with GDPR) shows, we want to assure you that your trust and privacy is of the utmost importance to us. If you sign up for our newsletter we can keep you up to date with the latest news on our support services for children and families, mental health research and fundraising. However, if at any point you wish to unsubscribe to the newsletter or change your personal preferences please email us using the form above or click ‘unsubscribe’ on the latest newsletter.  Telephone 01865 362789  Email [email protected]  Post Clear Sky Children’s Charity The Manor House, Little Wittenham, Abingdon, Oxfordshire, OX14 4RA Our charity credentials      Registered Charity No: 1140441 Company Registration No: 7273425 © Clear Sky 2022 | Terms & Conditions | Cookies | Privacy | Site by Herd Cookies Policy Our Website uses cookies to improve your experience.
